overview: Rubén and David are two teenage friends who live in a dormitory town in Seville. When they find out that Angel Max, the pop superstar of the moment, is in Seville to record his new video clip, they will try to meet him at any cost. They go to the hotel where he is staying and with the help of the hotel receptionist, they plan their big meeting with the superstar. During this little adventure, David declares his secret love for his friend Ruben, who does not reciprocate and a tense confrontation between them is provoked.
title: Talifanes
